FileFormat.FormatDescription: The FlashPix format is a raster based image format that builds on features of previous formats, including Kodak Image Pac, Live Picture IVUE, Hewlett-Packard JPEG, TIFF, and TIFF/EP. The FlashPix format is a cooperative endeavor that includes the Eastman Kodak Company, Microsoft Corporation, the Hewlett-Packard Company, and Live Picture, Inc.
